opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Ward, AKA Wilson v. United States

opinion:
543 U.S. 1103

WARD, AKA WILSON
v.
UNITED STATES.

No. 04-5528.

Supreme Court of United States.

January 24, 2005.

1

C. A. 10th Cir. Reported below: 96 Fed. Appx. 615; Motions of petitioners for leave to proceed in forma pauperis granted. Certiorari granted, judgments vacated, and cases remanded for further consideration in light of United States v. Booker, ante, p. 220.
